title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Mac/Win/Linux tool to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. with a built-in Model Registry and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via the REST endpoint.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client (PyPI: ollama) with sync/async clients and streaming generation.

title: langchain-ollama (LangChain integration)
summary: LangChain wrapper that lets you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, docs, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting, pulling and benchmarking models on Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: loads PDFs, builds Chroma vector index, answers with Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs with slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration node to use Ollama models as generators in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to Ollama REST API with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, completion, embed).

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing typed async/sync APIs to Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Lightweight Go client library for Ollama with streaming and chat helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) for C#/F# with async streaming and chat abstractions.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama backend for django-ai chatbots with admin UI.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, Postgres for local RAG.

title: ollama-models-hub
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama and one-line pull commands.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, custom Modelfiles, benchmarks and integrations around Ollama.
